No audio.  Vista with Media Player 11.  Do I need a different audio codec?
The file is using 5.1 audio.  Try downloading and installing AC3Filter.  It is a free download and will let media player play the 5.1 audio.

I downloaded the AC3filter. Can't figure out what I've done wrong but I'm still not getting any sound. Any suggestions?

@futurehillbillies: Goto http://www.videolan.org and download VLC media player. It's free, lightweight, and will play pretty much any video file with audio without needed extra codecs installed.

@aust77: Some of us buy the things we like once we've downloaded them. It's called supporting the industry when it does good ;)
